data.title: This is a great sub and cheesesteak restaurant
data.text: Great subs. We had a "Big Kahuna" cheesesteak, Italian sub, and a meatball. Everything was better than we expected. They also had Tastykakes. we went back for a "Supremo" but everything on the menu is great.

owner_response.author: jerseymikes2016, Guest Relations Manager at Jersey Mike's Subs, responded to this review
owner_response.text: You definitely picked some classic favorites, Simon! It's terrific that you thought everything was great and we exceeded your expectations. Please come back soon so you can try another one of the superb subs on our menu!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best of Subs - Take it to the Ocean
data.text: I'm from NY. I've lived in CA 9 years. These subs are like the NY deli type and fresh - they make it in front of you. They're happy. It's a small little place. Take it to go. Walk the 3 blocks to the beach (or drive and park). Sit and watch the ocean and sail boats and enjoy a wonderful sub. Regular size feeds 2 easily. My favorite is the Italian sub done "Mike's way" and I never get tired of it. But get what you want. Share a bag of chips. A fun, reasonable get-away for 2. Buy the Giant to feed more.

owner_response.author: jerseymikes2016, Guest Relations Manager at Jersey Mike's Subs, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Our team adores your review, and we appreciate you taking the time to share such thoughtful recommendations. Having started Jersey Mike's in the state of New Jersey, we can certainly understand how our methods remind you of the east coast. It would be a pleasure to serve you again, so make sure you stop by the next time you need an Original Italian and a moment to sit and admire the ocean.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Gotta love the sandwiches here!
data.text: If you've never been to a Jersey Mike's, you're missing out. Great hot and cold hoagie sandwiches. Everything is sliced fresh right in front of you. The philly is my fave.

owner_response.author: jerseymikes2016, Owner at Jersey Mike's Subs, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for taking the time to share your positive thoughts. We are glad you enjoy our fresh, deli sliced subs. We agree the Philly is delicious, and we look forward to serving you more in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: great  sub sandwiches and good variety
data.text: Very clean place and  fresh ingredients  and   delicious  subs.  Fast and friendly service  and  like the variety  of all the food there.

owner_response.author: Artie M, Owner at Jersey Mike's Subs, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the positive feedback and 5-stars. It sounds like you thoroughly enjoy everything Jersey Mike's has to offer, and we couldn’t be more delighted. We appreciate your ongoing support, and hope to serve you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Always Consistent & Delicious!
data.text: Being from New Jersey - the town next to Point Pleasant, to be exact - I am a harsh critic of two foods - pizza and subs!  This Jersey Mike's hit the nail on the head made my whole trip when I first found it!  This location is fast and easy to get in/out of.  The bread is the best part and is just as good as what you'll find at their original locations.  Very excited to have found this in Redondo, a frequent work & travel destination for me.  If you haven't had one of their subs - you're missing out.

owner_response.author: Artie M, Owner at Jersey Mike's Subs, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your kindhearted feedback. It is our goal to ensure the quality of our sandwiches is consistent with what you would expect in Jersey, and your comments are confirmation of our success. We love knowing you have found a piece of home, away from home with us, and look forward to serving you again and again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good sandwiches, helpful staff
data.text: The sandwiches we had were good.  The staff was very willing to offer suggestions on what to try.  the restaurant was clean and there were a few tables outside.  Although the sandwiches were good, they weren't anything out of the ordinary.

owner_response.author: Artie M, Owner at Jersey Mike's Subs, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are pleased to read that you found our sandwiches enjoyable, and our staff helpful and friendly. If there is anything we can do to turn that 3-star rating into something higher, please email us at ashleyjmsubs@gmail.com. Thank you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
